WebsiteReport.title: WebsiteReport
WebsiteReport.description: Entity representing user reports of fake or misleading websites.

id.description: Unique identifier for the WebsiteReport entity.

url.description: The URL of the reported website.

reportDate.description: Date and time when the website was reported.

reporterId.description: Reference to the user who reported the website.

reason.description: The reason why the website was reported (e.g., misinformation, scam, etc.).

description.description: A more detailed description of the issue with the website.

status.description: The status of the report (e.g., pending, under review, resolved).

User.title: User
User.description: Entity representing a user of the XyberFact application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

joinDate.description: Date and time when the user joined XyberFact.

collections.description: Stores user profile information. Path-based ownership ensures only the user can access their own data.
Stores website reports submitted by users. Includes denormalized 'reporterId' for authorization independence.
